TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StringFreezingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class StringFreezingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class StringFreezingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 使用 [Ngen.exe (原生映像產生器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md) 建立原生映像時，凍結字串常值。

span.span: Freezes a string literal when creating native images using the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別已被取代，在.NET Framework 3.5 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和更新版本。The class has been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 3.5 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and later versions. 凍結的字串是一個字串常值物件，適用於 managed 堆積和已序列化成原生映像[Ngen.exe （原生映像產生器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)。A frozen string is a string literal object that is compatible with the managed heap and has been serialized into a native image by the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md). 屬性可讓您藉由預先配置字串常值，在原生映像產生期間，而不在執行階段最佳化您的程式碼。The attribute allows you to optimize your code by pre-allocating string literals during native image generation rather than at run time. 已凍結字串常值後，程式碼可以直接參考原生映像中使用的位址的字串。After a string literal has been frozen, code can simply refer to the string using the address in the native image. 必須在組件層級上套用。The must be applied on the assembly level. 請注意 common language runtime (CLR) 無法卸載任何具有已凍結的字串，因為已凍結的字串可能會參考堆積中的任何物件的原生映像。Note that the common language runtime (CLR) cannot unload any native image that has a frozen string because any object in the heap might refer to the frozen string. 因此，您應該使用只在原生映像，其中包含已凍結的字串高度共用的情況下的類別。Therefore, you should use the class only in cases where the native image that contains the frozen string is shared heavily. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用組件。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute/vb/example.vb#1)]
